author: jsign
content:
cc <@592004585506340885> i think you were interested in proof verif times (iirc our last breakout call)
cc <@360491619402776577> reg the repricing dashboard i added gas/s throughput since i think you find that useful

author: taulepton_
content: What is the security level of the proofs? Are they standardised across provers?

author: jsign
content:
<@402080271563751435>  They all have different security levels (and proof sizes which is also more apparent difference).

The cryptography team is working in standarizing the security bits with some milestones. They wrote a nice blog post some time ago on this roadmap https://blog.ethereum.org/2025/12/18/zkevm-security-foundations

author: taulepton_
content: Is it possible to add a security level to the verification dashboard for the different proof types?

author: jsign
content: Yes, I think I could ask what is the current claimed security level for each and add it as metadata. Can help dashboard intepretation feel more fair. Good suggestion!
